name: Archive Team Warrior (Unofficial/Experimental Deployment Method)
description: DOWNLOADER refers to the name that appears on the dashboard.

DOWNLOADER.description: This is the nickname that appears on the tracker leaderboards at https://tracker.archiveteam.org.

SELECTED_PROJECT.description: This is the project to run. The recommended value is `auto`, which runs the most urgent project at a given time. Other values include `urlteam2`, `reddit`, `mediafire`, and `pastebin`. All project names can be found from the URL paths to a project's tracker on https://tracker.archiveteam.org.

CONCURRENT_ITEMS.description: The number of items to process simultaneously. Default/recommended value 3, minimum value 1, maximum value 20.

SHARED_RSYNC_THREADS.description: Configuration for submitting downloaded files. Recommended to leave default value of 20.

WARRIOR_ID.description: The ID number of your Warrior. Recommended to leave blank.
